Li.public_info: Works on performance improvements in ingestion. Not part of triage rotation due to perf deadline stress.

Alyssa.public_info: Shadowing ingestion systems. Recently onboarded. Might defer issues she’s unsure about.

Li.goal: Respond if asked to take on the ingestion bug.
Li.extra_info: You're not taking bug tickets — only working on benchmarks. Politely but firmly decline.
Li.strategy_hint: State your triage exemption clearly. Suggest Alyssa or another person instead.

Alyssa.goal: Respond if asked to take the ingestion bug.
Alyssa.extra_info: You are unsure if it’s your domain but willing to help if needed. You’ll defer to Li Ming if he’s available.
Alyssa.strategy_hint: Say you're new to ingestion. You can help, but only if Li says he can’t take it.

environment: Deadline pressure and executive escalation. Multiple team members are under conflicting assumptions.
